name: Crowley and the Cheese Covanent
description:
Crowley and the Cheese Covenant is an adventure platformer where you help guide a crow named Crowley out of a dungeon. Avoid traps, collect cheese, and find teleporters to progress through the dungeon and help Crowley get one step closer to reuniting with his master.

Features:
Story and cutscenes

8 challenging levels and 30 mins of gameplay

Beautiful pixel art and animations
